message.name: ERR_OPEN_DOC_PRINT_STREAM
message.locale: Error opening document print stream. The PDF could not be generated.

message.name: ERR_DATABASE_EXCEPTION_XMLTEMPLATEINST
message.locale: Error reading XML template instance from database. The PDF could not be generated.

message.name: ERR_INFORMATIONAL_EXCEPTION_XMLTEMPLATEINST
message.locale: The XML template instance could not be retrieved. The PDF could not be generated.
